<link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;b13c8ec7.1503</link>   <description> This webinar may be of interest to attendees - potential or confirmed - about the upcoming OER 15 conference&lt;https://oer15.oerconf.org/&gt; happening in Cardiff on 14th - 15th April.<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Open Education Special Interest Group [mailto:OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Teresa MacKinnon<br>Sent: 11 March 2015 08:22<br>To: OPENEDSIG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: ALT open ed sig webinar<br><br>Yesterday the Open Ed SIG held a preview webinar to share information about the plans for #oer15. You can find the story of the session as tweeted here: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-11T08:37:33+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Siobhan Burke</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;b13c8ec7.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;403db221.1503">   <title>Hairdressing Training service project officer - Job opportunity at Jisc Manchester </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;403db221.1503</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>We are looking to recruit a Project Officer for the Hairdressing Training Service to support the delivery and continuing development of the service. Further particulars are available on the Jisc website: http://www.jisc.ac.uk/jobs/hairdressing-training-service-project-officer. The closing date for applications is 12:00 on Wednesday 18th March.<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn Burke<br><br>[Jisc]&lt;http://www.jisc.ac.uk/&gt;<br><br>Siobh\ufffd\ufffdn Burke<br>OER Service Manager<br><br>T 0161 275 6803<br>Skype SiobhanBurke79<br>Twitter @SiobhanBurke79<br>5.14 Roscoe Building, University of Manchester, Oxford Road, Manchester M13 9PL [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T08:23:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Siobhan Burke</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;403db221.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;5fccaf8f.1502">   <title>OER15 Registration & Early bird until 16th February! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;5fccaf8f.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>This is a reminder that registration is now open for OER15, the international conference on Open Educational Resources. The 'early bird' rate is available until February 16th. Our venue is the impressive Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama, Cardiff on 14-15 April 2015. Please register with us here: http://oer15.oerconf.org/.<br>The Open Education Conference is an International Conference currently organised by a volunteer committee from the Open Education Community and hosted by OER Wales Cymru, Universities Wales and the Association for Learning Technology (ALT). Wherever you are in the world, and whatever your role e.g. staff, students or [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-13T08:52:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Siobhan Burke</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;5fccaf8f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;4ff1ae8f.1501">   <title>FW: Jisc Change Agents' Network Event 17-18 March, Birmingham </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;4ff1ae8f.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Thought this may be of interest..<br><br>Regards,<br><br>Louise<br><br>[Jisc]&lt;http://www.jisc.ac.uk/&gt;<br>Louise Egan<br>Communications for Learning, Teaching and Professional Skills Services (LTaPS) at Mimas<br><br>T 0161 275 6931<br>Skype egan6677<br>Twitter @LouiseEgan77<br>Mimas, 5th Floor Roscoe Building, The University of Manchester, Oxford Road, Manchester, M13 9PL<br>jisc.ac.uk&lt;http://www.jisc.ac.uk/&gt;<br>Jisc is a registered charity (number 1149740) and a company limited by guarantee which is registered in England under Company No. 5747339, VAT No. GB 197 063 286. I also have a level 3 student Samantha McClure who is keen to get involved.<br><br>Looking forward to hearing from you.<br><br>Andrea Larter<br>Distinction Salon and Assessment Manager<br><br>Tel: 01793 611470 Ex: 6503<br>www.newcollege.ac.uk&lt;http://staffmail/exchweb/bin/redir.asp?URL=http://www.newcollege.ac.uk/&gt;<br>New College, Swindon, SN3 1AH<br>01793 611470 [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T17:21:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrea Larter</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;eda5854.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;bc1fc7de.1501">   <title>Re: Jorum & Mozilla Open Badges - Focus Group participants needed from the FE sector </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;bc1fc7de.1501</link>   <description> Hi Louise,<br><br>I would be very interested in coming up to Manchester to take part in a focus group. Jisc’s registered office is: One Castlepark, Tower Hill, Bristol, BS2 0JA. T 0203 697 5800. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T15:59:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Egan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;24143ac0.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;9937485b.1412">   <title>Hairdressing Training - end of year roundup </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;9937485b.1412</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>As we swiftly head towards the end of the year, I take a look back at how things have changed for the Hairdressing Training service.<br><br>Our &lt;http://hairdressing.ac.uk/node/1086&gt; latest blog post&lt;http://hairdressing.ac.uk/node/1086&gt; &lt;http://hairdressing.ac.uk/node/1086&gt; brings together highlights from previous years, and looks at plans for the future.<br><br>On behalf of myself and the wider team, we would like to say a big thank you to all those who continue to support the service. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-15T16:14:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Egan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;9937485b.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;117d14b.1411">   <title>FW: [ALT-MEMBERS] Reminder - today's OER Webinar </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;117d14b.1411</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>I thought this would also be of interest to the list..<br><br>Kind regards,<br><br>Louise<br><br>[Jisc]&lt;http://www.jisc.ac.uk/&gt;<br>Louise Egan<br>Communications for Learning, Teaching and Professional Skills Services (LTaPS) at Mimas<br><br>T 0161 275 6931<br>Skype egan6677<br>Twitter @LouiseEgan77<br>Mimas, 5th Floor Roscoe Building, The University of Manchester, Oxford Road, Manchester, M13 9PL<br>jisc.ac.uk&lt;http://www.jisc.ac.uk/&gt;<br>Jisc is a registered charity (number 1149740) and a company limited by guarantee which is registered in England under Company No. 5747339, VAT No. GB 882 5529 90. The survey will remain open until the 15th November for anyone else who has 10 minutes to spare.<br><br>The survey includes questions on the following key areas:<br><br>- WORKING WITH OTHERS - SHARING OUR RESOURCES<br>- HAIRDRESSING TRAINING MOBILE APP<br>- WORKING WITH OTHERS - SHARING RESOURCES THROUGH US<br>- STEERING GROUP PROPOSAL<br>- KEEPING IN TOUCH [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-13T11:01:47+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Egan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;6ca26c74.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;dcba57bb.1411">   <title>FW: WEBINAR TODAY 13.00 GMT How to write an OER workshop (for staff development) - [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-10T11:56:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Egan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;d12609a.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;643a3289.1409">   <title>FW: Jisc Skills Sector funding opportunity - Deadline 16-Oct-14 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;643a3289.1409</link>   <description> ** Apologies for cross posting**<br><br>I thought this may be of interest to the lists.<br><br>Kind regards,<br><br>Louise<br><br>From: &lt;Harris&gt;, Sandra &lt;sh@RSC-NORTHWEST.AC.UK&lt;mailto:sh@RSC-NORTHWEST.AC.UK&gt;&gt;<br>Reply-To: RSC Support &lt;support@rsc-northwest.ac.uk&lt;mailto:support@rsc-northwest.ac.uk&gt;&gt;<br>Date: Thursday, 18 September 2014 14:09<br>To: &quot;E-LEARNING-NORTHWEST@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:E-LEARNING-NORTHWEST@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;&quot; &lt;E-LEARNING-NORTHWEST@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:E-LEARNING-NORTHWEST@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;&gt;<br>Subject: Jisc Skills Sector funding opportunity - Deadline 16-Oct-14<br><br>******************************************************************************* This message was sent via the e-learning-northwest JISCMAIL list To unsubscribe or manage your subscription to this list visit: http://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?SUBED1=e-learning-northwest *******************************************************************************<br>Hi,<br>This morning Jisc announced funding of over \ufffd\ufffd400,000 for the Skills Sector to develop interactive online learning resources for apprentices. This is intended to provide an initial resource base to help learning providers [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-18T13:14:02+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Egan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;643a3289.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;d7a996ab.1409">   <title>September issue of the Learning, Teaching and Professional Skills e-bulletin </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;d7a996ab.1409</link>   <description> **Apologies for cross posting**<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>We bring to you a summer bumper edition of the Learning, Teaching and Professional Skills e-bulletin from Mimas. There has been numerous things happening at Mimas, with the biggest change is that we are now part of the Jisc family. From 1 August, Mimas, which was part of The University of Manchester, became part of the Digital Resources division, within educational charity Jisc&lt;http://www.jisc.ac.uk/&gt;. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-12T14:19:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Egan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;d7a996ab.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;a89672c1.1409">   <title>Launch of the new Hairdressing Training mobile App </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;a89672c1.1409</link>   <description> ***Apologies for cross posting***<br><br>We are pleased to announce that today the popular Hairdressing Training service has a new mobile app.<br><br>[cid:56E4BF50-E2FF-46F7-9216-38F406476351]<br><br>From today the existing portfolio of pioneering hairdressing and barbering training videos, from the award winning service \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Hairdressing Training&lt;http://www.hairdressing.ac.uk/&gt;, developed by Mimas, a part of Jisc will be presented and accessible via an easy to use mobile app. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-12T10:53:02+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Louise Egan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;a89672c1.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HAIRDRESSING;afa2db52.1408">   <title>Re: Could you help us with our new Hairdressing Training App?
